name: Rusty Iron Ore
description: Ore from the Solstice Mine. Good for smithing or throwing at pigeons.

name: Minor Health Potion
description: Heals the player from minor injuries. Tastes like cherry and medicine.

name: Lumberjack's Lager
description: Gives you the sudden urge to chop things. Side effects include wearing flannel.

name: Miner's Mud
description: Tastes like dirt, but makes your arms feel like jackhammers.

name: Angler's Ale
description: Makes you smell so much like a fish that they actually trust you.

name: Light-Finger Liquid
description: Turns your fingers into butter. The slippery kind, not the tasty kind.

name: Chef's Secret Sauce
description: You finally understand that salt is actually necessary.

name: Alchemist's Mistake
description: A potion that makes you better at making potions. Don't think about the logic too hard.

name: Bouncy Brew
description: Makes your knees feel 20 years younger and slightly rubbery.

name: Green Thumb Tonic
description: Plants seem to grow faster just to get away from your singing.

name: Blacksmith's Beverage
description: Hardens your skin and your resolve. And your liver.

name: Hunter's Hooch
description: Gives you a very specific set of skills for finding things with too many legs.

name: Zoom Juice
description: The world slows down, or you just start vibrating. It's hard to tell.

name: Mule's Milk
description: Makes your backpack feel like it's filled with helium. Do not actually drink milk from a mule.
